name: Alice Johnson
review: JK Tag Rocket saved us countless QA hours. The tracker validation is spot on and saved multiple campaign disasters. Highly recommended!

name: Rahul Mehta
review: We tested over a dozen tools, but JK Tag Rocket stood out for its speed, simplicity, and comprehensive VAST event tracking.

name: Lena Schmidt
review: The interface is clean, intuitive, and made our QA process far more efficient. Tracker breakdown is a big win.

name: Carlos Rivera
review: Finally, a tool that understands the pain of ad tech QA. This saved us hours during our last video ad audit.

name: Emily Zhang
review: The Events and Trackers tabs are really helpful. Loved the progress chart too — very SpringServe-like!

name: James O'Neil
review: JK Tag Rocket helped us catch broken trackers before launch. A must-have for any video campaign.

name: Sofia Petrova
review: It’s rare to find a QA tool that's both developer-friendly and useful for campaign managers. Great job!

name: Mohammed Al-Khatib
review: Very user-friendly and efficient. Loved the URL parsing and real-time log tracking.

name: Haruki Tanaka
review: Tracker-level validation and visual feedback is a game changer. Keep improving this tool!

name: Laura Bennett
review: Our ad ops team now starts every QA round with JK Tag Rocket. Easy to use and reliable.

name: David Kim
review: Was able to troubleshoot a VPAID issue in seconds thanks to this tool. It's now part of our standard process.

name: Giulia Conti
review: Perfect for junior QA folks and senior managers alike. The logs and event mapping are incredibly helpful.

name: Arjun Patel
review: We used to debug VAST tags manually. This tool reduced our time by 70%. Love the attention to detail.

name: Maya Robinson
review: A very smart tool. Clean interface, useful outputs, and great for reviewing 3rd party tags.

name: Niklas Andersen
review: Our media team can now verify tracker behavior without bothering devs. Excellent utility.

name: Chen Wei
review: Simple input, detailed output. JK Tag Rocket is my go-to for ad tag inspection now.

name: Rachel Stein
review: The logs helped identify a faulty impression tracker instantly. Can't believe we operated without this for so long.

name: Ivan Dobrev
review: Excellent UI, very quick load time, and supports multiple VAST versions. Great job!

name: Priya Nair
review: The animated chart is a nice touch. More importantly, the logs helped us validate campaign performance metrics.

name: Tom Becker
review: This tool keeps getting better. Keep an eye on JK Tag Rocket — it's setting a new standard.
